pullRequest.title: Fix distinct set collector
pullRequest.bodyText:
A typo was introduced during refactoring (73d1d26) that caused the combiner to not work properly.
This PR adds a bunch of tests (ff16e46), fixes the aforementioned issue (6a90863) and does some refactoring (c30ae03 and 400983e).
Proposed commit message:
Fix distinct set collector

[As above, but without commit references.]

PR: 162


I hereby agree to the terms of the JUnit Pioneer Contributor License Agreement.

commit.message: Add tests for distinct set collector

Fix typo

Probably happened during refactoring.

Fix param name

It's not necessarily right (or left, or someting else), but just a set.

Fix assertion

It's a (hash) set, so no order guarantee.

nodes.bodyText: Do you think we should really verify that it's a HashSet - any other implementation should be fine as well, right?

commit.message: Remove test that verifies use of `HashSet`
